channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 7th January
item.description:
Abandoned vehicle - not moved for at least 3 months. Expired MOT - not roadworthy. Parts of vehicle, front bumper, lights, rear Â¾ held on with tape

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kings Highway, Plumstead

item.title: Newly abandoned car in car park., 7th January
item.description:
Local business on Vicarage Road continuing to fly tip cars in this car park on a regular basis. Two other cars still dumped here for several months.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Vicarage Park, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Masonry from building falling on pavement, 7th January
item.description:
Masonry has fallen from the roof of one of the buildings onto the pavement location I have marked on the map. The rubble has been moved to the side so it does not block the pathway but there is a risk that further masonry could fall - it happened over the Christmas period as well.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Bridge to Windmill Bridge Junction, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose pavings slabs, 7th January
item.description:
Bexley Council have visited the scene. Left a yellow fence outside property weeks before Xmas. Returned, only to fix other areas and not the area with the fence. When is this going to be fixed?

item.title: Food waste bags have been left on the pavement, 7th January
item.description:
Today is the collection of food waste for Elmcroft Road. Bins have been emptied and some left outside 51 Elmcroft Road,. The resident said they are not his bags, They need to be collected before foxes rip them open and create a mess

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmcroft Road, Goddington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large suitcase and other items on pavement, 7th January
item.description:
